street_name: Site Bound by Raven Row Stepney Way, Sidney Street
description: Notification from LB Tower Hamlets of application ref: PA/20/00571 for minor material amendments to planning permission dated 12/09/2019 ref: PA/18/00917 for Demolition of existing buildings and erection of three blocks comprising residential units (Use Class C3), commercial floorspace, off-street car parking spaces, communal courtyards, associated landscaping and associated ancillary works. Minor Material Amendments to Planning permission Ref: PA/18/00917, Dated 12/09/2019: Amendments include: ? Overall increase of residential units [from 648 to 704]; ? Increase in affordable unit provision [from 159 to 184 (32% to 35% of total)]; ? Increased height to blocks A and C (up to two additional storeys). Block A would be up to 22 storeys and Block C up to 28 storeys. ? Amended residential unit mix ? Reduction in on-site parking spaces ? Increased office floorspace (use class B1) ? Additional amenity space and associated works The application is accompanied by an Environmental Statement
